DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to create an institutional registry of sepsis through a prospective survey based on epidemiological data, risk factors, diagnosis, prognosis, treatment, monitoring and survival.
DOC.brief_title: Sepsis Institutional Registry in Hospital Italiano de Buenos Aires
DOC.detailed_description: The main goal is to describe the occurrence of sepsis and the characteristics of clinical presentation, evolution and predisposing factors within the population of the Hospital Italiano de Buenos Aires.
DOC.criteria: 1. Over 17 years 2. Two or more sirs criteria 3. Active infection 1. Refusal to register or to the informed consent process 2. Ambulatory patients
